name: Save the SHEEP (de1mossss, yourlx)
description:
Save The SHEEP the game about saving sheeps! LOL! Don't let sheeps sacrifice themselves! Sheeps can breed themselves!

Controls:
WASD - move camera
Mouse scroll - zoom in/out
Mouse to borders of screen - move camera.
LMB (Left mouse button) - to take sheep in you hands!

How to beat: Just don't let sheep go to the ritual circle!

What we used:
Unity 2021.3 LTS - as a Game Engine
Blender - for some model

External assets:
Sound effects - some from our voices, others from freesound.org
Sheep - free model from internet
Buildings and nature - free models from itch.io

Made for "Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice" by de1mossss and yourlx
